final_project.control
Class SMSController

java.lang.Object
  final_project.control.SMSController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, Runnable
public class SMSController
extends Object
implements Constants, Runnable

SMSController Class This class handles sending out text messages to the instances of the IMessagable interface stored in the IPersonStore class.

Author:
mksteele

 boolean cancelSubscription()
           
 void getInbox()
           
 void parseMessage(String received, String number)
          SMS PROTOCOL: What kind of messages are people going to be able to sign up for? SUBSCRIBING TO A CERTAIN FENCER: they should type: "Follow Miranda Steele" --> Full name? or for a team: "Follow team Brown" STOPPING SUBSCRIPTIONS: to stop all subscriptions: "Stop" or to just stop a certain fencer: "Stop following Miranda Steele" or to stop a certain team: "Stop following team Brown" OTHER THINGS: ?? Things we need to be able to handle: - case sensitivity - common typos (fencre, follw) --> is this really necessary?

parseMessage

public void parseMessage(String received,
                         String number)
SMS PROTOCOL: What kind of messages are people going to be able to sign up for? SUBSCRIBING TO A CERTAIN FENCER: they should type: "Follow Miranda Steele" --> Full name? or for a team: "Follow team Brown" STOPPING SUBSCRIPTIONS: to stop all subscriptions: "Stop" or to just stop a certain fencer: "Stop following Miranda Steele" or to stop a certain team: "Stop following team Brown" OTHER THINGS: ?? Things we need to be able to handle: - case sensitivity - common typos (fencre, follw) --> is this really necessary?
